question:
Which of the following places were snatched by Marathas from Ahmad Shah Abdali?
1) Punjab
2) Bundelkhand
3) Malwa
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Ahmad Shah was the only son of Mohd. Shah Rangeela who ascended the throne in 1748 CE. During the reign of Ahmad Shah Abdali, the Marathas snatched Malwa and Bundelkhand.
